mapper.sql: a.sku_id as skuId, a.g_id as gId, a.sku_tob_price as skuTobPrice, a.sku_toc_price as skuTocPrice, a.sku_is_num as skuIsNum, a.sku_sale_num as skuSaleNum, a.sku_num as skuNum, a.sku_goods_type as skuGoodsType, a.sku_repo_goods as skuRepoGoods, a.sku_repo_goods_name as skuRepoGoodsName, a.`status` as status, a.status_text as statusText
mapper.select:
select
from tb_sku a where a.sku_id = #{skuid}
select a.*, b.g_start_time, b.g_end_time, b.g_seller_id, b.g_seller_name from tb_sku a left join tb_goods b on b.g_id = a.g_id where a.sku_id in (${skuids})
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_sku( sku_id, g_id, sku_tob_price, sku_toc_price, sku_is_num, sku_sale_num, sku_num, sku_goods_type, sku_repo_goods, sku_repo_goods_name,status,is_del ) values
( #{sku.skuId}, #{sku.gId}, #{sku.skuTobPrice}, #{sku.skuTocPrice}, #{sku.skuIsNum}, #{sku.skuSaleNum}, #{sku.skuNum}, #{sku.skuGoodsType}, #{sku.skuRepoGoods}, #{sku.skuRepoGoodsName}, #{sku.status}, #{sku.isDel} )
mapper.update: delete from tb_sku where sku_id in (${delSkus})
update tb_sku set sku_num = #{skuNum} where sku_id = #{skuId}

update tb_sku a set a.g_id = #{gId}, a.sku_tob_price = #{skuTobPrice}, a.sku_toc_price = #{skuTocPrice}, a.sku_is_num = #{skuIsNum}, a.sku_sale_num = #{skuSaleNum}, a.sku_num = #{skuNum}, a.sku_goods_type = #{skuGoodsType}, a.sku_repo_goods = #{skuRepoGoods}, a.sku_repo_goods_name = #{skuRepoGoodsName} where a.sku_id = #{skuId}
mapper.select: select s.sku_id,m.sku_id,m.`status` from tb_num m ,tb_sku s where m.sku_id = s.sku_id and s.g_id= #{gId} and m.`status`!=2
mapper.update: update tb_sku s set s.sku_num=s.sku_num-#{order_amount} where s.sku_num>=#{order_amount} and s.sku_id=#{sku_id}
